title: Fractal Pattern
code:
§begin fractal
  iterations ← [1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32]
  pattern ← §create_array
  §iterate level §in iterations
    scaled ← level ⊕ level
    §transmit scaled
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: generates a self-similar pattern by doubling values at each level
hints: This creates a fractal-like recursive pattern
Fractals appear in nature and art
